column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " I 've tried everything in my power , but ... I can not restore Korra 's bending . "
#Text=Lin says : " But you 're the best healer in the world , you have to keep trying ! "
#Text=Katara says : " I 'm sorry , there 's nothing else I can do .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , it 's not .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , wait .
#Text=" Korra says : " Go away .
#Text=" Mako says : " I will , but I just want you to know , I 'm here for you .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I mean , go away , back to Republic City .
#Text=Get on with your life .
#Text=" Mako says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not the Avatar anymore .
#Text=You do n't need to do me any favors .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't care if you 're the Avatar or not .
#Text=Listen , when Tarrlok took you I was losing my mind at the thought of never seeing you again , I realized ... I love you , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " I - I ca n't .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra !
#Text="
